Title: Relates to the acceleration of the downstate casino licenses
Summary: Relates to the acceleration of the downstate casino licenses; sets forth criteria for applications; sets forth procedures for the review and approval of applications; makes related provisions.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to the acceleration of the downstate casino licenses
